text: Yeah, yeah, wrong hands, blah blah. Abe, you're not the chosen one. You're just a guy who was dealt a bad hand. Dump the book and get your life back.

segments.text: Yeah, yeah, wrong hands, blah blah. Abe, you're not the chosen one.
You're just a guy who was dealt a bad hand. Dump the book and get your life back.
